name: Loan Interchange
overview:
Finding Commercial Lenders Made Simple

Loan Interchange is an exchange platform where borrowers and their agents can anonymously post commercial or residential loan requests. In return, borrowers & their agents receive custom quotes & solutions from active and interested lenders.

By eliminating lead generation and commission arrangements to client development AND introducing more clarity, choice and control for all parties, the experience improves for borrowers, brokers & lenders. Borrowing may never be fun but finding out your options quickly and conveniently is a good start.

Our community research also indicated a high level of frustration when trying to access the secondary market for whole loans or notes, especially at the local level.

The local expert is often the best suited to clear troubled properties and loan assets in their own community. As a result, the note exchange features the same principles of clarity, choice & control for all parties when buying and selling real estate notes.
